summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.7°C) and outside temperature (down 2.4°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 774 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1472 m), feels like temperature (up 5.7°C), outside temperature (up 4.0°C), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 773.8m lower than yesterday, 593.8m lower than the past week, 1471.7m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 745m and a high of 3580m, averaging 1212.7m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Showers, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and the light is absent. Weather could become unsettled.
